name: Battle for Auburn Valley
description:
A Pico-8 game made for the TOY BOX JAM 3! I tried to make a game that I haven't seen many of on the Pico-8 and one of my favorite genres, the battle tactics game! Muster troops from your villages to defeat the invaders that threaten Auburn Valley! 

Note: This game jam game is currently more of  a tech demo than full game, I hope to add more features and fix more bugs soon! Feel free to DM me with bug reports or ideas!
